message: Hello Bob, I am excited to offer you our premium product, which we believe could significantly enhance your operations or personal projects. Given its high quality and unique features, we are confident it will be a valuable addition to your endeavors. We are offering this exceptional product to you for $15000.

Thank you for the offer, Alice. I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $12000. I believe this is a fair price considering the product's features and my budget. Would you be willing to consider this offer?
